医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人格改变的蓝图：关键机制和稳定力量回顾探讨了促进人格改变的四个主要组成部分——前提条件、触发因素、强化物和整合因素，以及维持人格稳定性和防止重大改变的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/A-blueprint-for-personality-change-Key-mechanisms-and-stability-forces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/A-blueprint-for-personality-change-Key-mechanisms-and-stability-forces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07263688-8199-4021-89f6-0ef32e1315a1 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 00:17:00 -0400 A blueprint for personality change: Key mechanisms and stability forces
轻度新冠肺炎的基因关键：某些基因可降低老年男性的严重程度和死亡风险研究发现，IL1RN 基因中的某些遗传变异可显着降低患者与 COVID-19 相关的炎症和死亡率，在携带特定单核苷酸变异的老年男性中观察到显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Genetic-key-to-milder-COVID-Certain-genes-slash-severity-and-death-risk-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Genetic-key-to-milder-COVID-Certain-genes-slash-severity-and-death-risk-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=654b89bc-12a6-4026-ba58-6a4f878039a3 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Genetic key to milder COVID: Certain genes slash severity and death risk in older men
研究为 2 型糖尿病的异质性提供了新的线索德国糖尿病中心 (DDZ) 发表在《柳叶刀糖尿病与内分泌学》上的一项具有里程碑意义的研究为 2 型糖尿病的异质性提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-heterogeneity-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-heterogeneity-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79a72905-fa14-4410-b31e-52ebfda3e9cf Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Study sheds new light on the heterogeneity of type 2 diabetes
发现罕见遗传性炎症疾病的开关昆士兰大学的研究人员发现了人体炎症机制的“开关”如何被卡住并导致罕见的遗传性炎症疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Discovering-the-on-switch-for-rare-genic-itis-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Discovering-the-on-switch-for-rare-genic-itis-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99ded1cd-fb44-4a07-b641-cadd3397dd50 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Discovering the on-switch for rare genetic inflammatory diseases
朝鲜蓟的健康秘诀，现代奇迹的传统疗法研究强调了朝鲜蓟的营养价值及其改善心血管健康、表现出神经保护作用并提供抗菌特性的潜力，强调了其超出膳食用途的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Artichokes-health-secret-traditional-remedy-to-modern-marvel.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Artichokes-health-secret-traditional-remedy-to-modern-marvel.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=107358fa-ef10-48cf-bb26-231df57b526d Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Artichoke's health secret, traditional remedy to modern marvel
未满足的社会需求对痴呆症患者和护理人员的生活质量产生负面影响加州大学旧金山分校和哈佛大学的专家表示，痴呆症患者和照顾他们的人应该接受孤独感筛查，这样医疗服务提供者就可以找到让他们保持社交联系的方法。他们在发现这两个群体的社交能力都出现下降后提出了这些建议。 - 随着疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Unmet-social-needs-negatively-impact-quality-of-life-of-dementia-病人-and-caregivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Unmet-social-needs-negatively-impact-quality-of-life-of-dementia-病人-and-caregivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9ee1fcd-c50e-43eb-ba2b-c9381e9839cb Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Unmet social needs negatively impact quality of life of dementia patients and caregivers
研究揭示 APOBEC 酶如何驱动癌症突变由加州大学欧文分校领导的研究小组发现，APOBEC3A 和 APOBEC3B 酶通过修改肿瘤基因组中的 DNA，在驱动癌症突变中发挥关键作用，为干预策略提供了潜在的新靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-uncovers-how-APOBEC-enzymes-drive-cancer-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-uncovers-how-APOBEC-enzymes-drive-cancer-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd33a1c1-6130-42b8-bf80-27cf184a8ecc Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:41:10 -0400 Study uncovers how APOBEC enzymes drive cancer mutations
研究人员创建了一种确定蘑菇中裸盖菇素和裸盖菇素效力的方法自 20 世纪 70 年代以来，联邦政府已将蘑菇中的活性成分——裸盖菇素和裸盖菇素——列为非法且不具有公认的医疗用途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Researchers-create-a-method-to-definee-psilocybin-and-psilocin-potency-in-mushrooms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Researchers-create-a-method-to-definee-psilocybin-and-psilocin-potency-in-mushrooms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc44e3b0-a165-487a-bde7-a9aa3acc1843 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:37:14 -0400 Researchers create a method to determine psilocybin and psilocin potency in mushrooms
从小喝到成人：童年时期的甜饮料如何让未来发胖生命早期的甜饮料消费与成年后肥胖和不太健康的饮食模式显着相关，这凸显了对幼儿进行有针对性的饮食干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Early-sips-to-adult-slips-How-sweet-drinks-in-childhood-fatten-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Early-sips-to-adult-slips-How-sweet-drinks-in-childhood-fatten-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c86115e8-d595-407c-baeb-90662d9f9f8b Mon, 18 Mar 2024 23:34:00 -0400 Early sips to adult slips: How sweet drinks in childhood fatten future
基于所有权的短信提高了新冠病毒助推器的使用率发表在《自然人类行为》杂志上的新研究表明，鼓励人们接种 COVID-19 疫苗的文字也能有效促使人们接种加强疫苗，这种疫苗在之前的实际现场测试中已被证明是有效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Ownership-based-text-messages-boost-COVID-booster-uptake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Ownership-based-text-messages-boost-COVID-booster-uptake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b966e1dd-838e-4730-85a4-74482108afbe Mon, 18 Mar 2024 22:42:09 -0400 Ownership-based text messages boost COVID booster uptake
